Invocation Name: escape scenarios
des:
Escape Scenarios is an escape room-style game, where you'll find yourself in a number of engaging settings and find ways to navigate to an escape.

Our first release features the Nuclear Reactor scenario, in which you'll find yourself trapped in an abandoned nuclear facility--will you be able to escape before disaster strikes?

Core commands for the game:
Look {direction} - to scan your environment ("look right", "look down", "look around", etc.)
Inspect {object} - to check out an object ("inspect note", "inspect generators", etc.)
Use {item} on {object} - to use an object on another ("use keycard on lock", "use wrench on bolt", etc.)
Go to {location} - to move to a new location ("go to the hallway", "go through the doorway", etc.)

Additional commands:
Instructions - hear detailed instructions on how to play the game
Repeat - have Alexa repeat what was just said
Inventory - hear a list of the items in your inventory 

Best of luck in solving the puzzles! Though they may seem difficult, they are all solvable--don't be afraid to test out unusual combinations of items, pull different levers, and glean hints by observing various items in your environment.

Note: though available in the tutorial, hints are not currently supported in the Nuclear Reactor scenario.
